spec_data.Name: gnome-rdp
spec_data.Description:
gnome-rdp is a Remote Desktop Protocol client for the GNOME desktop
environment. It supports RDP, VNC and SSH. Configured sessions can be saved to
the built in list.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 06:06:18 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Remote Desktop Protocol client for the GNOME desktop environment
